Name: Steven Wolf
Description:
Background Info: Orphaned from the great black out. Raised in small town, you discovered your genius at an early age. This had always made you feel like a outsider, often leading you to be teased and bullied.
Driven to seclusion from the people around you. You dove into your studies and worked your way to a highly coveted position. For the first time in your life you at least felt connected to something, that was until the accident. Feelings of guilt over your teams death has kept you up most nights. You vow to seek revenge, your even willing to change everything you believe in to do it.

Actions.Name: Open
Actions.Tooltip: Open your equipment bag to see what you have.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Tooltip: Close your equipment bag.

Actions.Name: Check Stats
Actions.Tooltip: View your current stats in Player's profile.

Actions.Name: Skip Time
Actions.Tooltip: Advance the game time by a chosen amount.

Actions.Name: Talk
Actions.Tooltip: Initiate a conversation with a character.

Actions.Name: read mind
Actions.Tooltip: Read the thoughts of a target.

Actions.Name: give order
Actions.Tooltip: Command a target to perform an action.

Actions.Name: dominate
Actions.Tooltip: Dominate the mind of a target.

Actions.Name: mental blast
Actions.Tooltip: Unleash a powerful mental attack on a target.

Actions.Name: psychic leech
Actions.Tooltip: Drain mental energy from a target to heal yourself.

Actions.Name: physical slam
Actions.Tooltip: Deliver a crushing physical attack to a target.

Actions.Name: mental healing
Actions.Tooltip: Heal your wounds through mental focus.

Actions.Name: psionic shield
Actions.Tooltip: Create a mental shield to absorb damage.

Actions.Name: equip
Actions.Tooltip: Equip an item from your inventory.

Actions.Name: unequip
Actions.Tooltip: Unequip an item you are currently using.

Actions.Name: use
Actions.Tooltip: Use an item from your inventory.

Actions.Name: drop
Actions.Tooltip: Drop an item from your inventory.

Actions.Name: give
Actions.Tooltip: Give an item to another character.

Actions.Name: examine
Actions.Tooltip: Examine an object or character closely.

Actions.Name: wait
Actions.Tooltip: Wait for a specified amount of time.

Actions.Name: move
Actions.Tooltip: Move to a different location.

Actions.Name: attack
Actions.Tooltip: Attack a target in combat.

Actions.Name: defend
Actions.Tooltip: Defend against an incoming attack.

Actions.Name: escape
Actions.Tooltip: Attempt to flee from combat.

Actions.Name: Hack
Actions.Tooltip: Use your hacking skills to interact with electronic devices around.

Actions.Name: Call
Actions.Tooltip: Use your Com Unit to make a call.

Actions.Name: read
Actions.Tooltip: Read readable object

Actions.Name: sleep
Actions.Tooltip: Sleep to restore energy and health.

Actions.Name: train
Actions.Tooltip: Train to improve your abilities.

Abilities.Name: Psychic Leech
Abilities.Tooltip: Absorb target's brain power, doing damage and healing yourself.

Abilities.Name: Physical Slam
Abilities.Tooltip: Crush the mind of your target dealing heavy damage.

Abilities.Name: Mental Healing
Abilities.Tooltip: Focus on your wounds to miraculously close them.

Abilities.Name: Psionic Shield
Abilities.Tooltip: Create a psychic shield that absorbs 10 damage.
